text: M13 is a Ukrainian international highway (M-highway) connecting Kropyvnytskyi to the border with Moldova, where before crossing the Dniester it heads towards Chişinău as the M21.Ukraine International Highways in RussianEuropean Highways in Russian ==Main Route== Main route and connections to/intersections with other highways in Ukraine. {| class="wikitable" style="margin- left:0.5em;" |- !Marker !!Main settlements !!Notes !!Highway Interchanges |- |0 km |Kropyvnytskyi | |/ • • |- | |Liubashivka | | |- |254 km |Platonove / Border (Moldova) | | |} ;Note Technically the route crosses Transnistria. ==See also== * Roads in Ukraine * Ukraine Highways * International E-road network * Pan-European corridors ==References== ==External links== * International Roads in Ukraine in Russian * European Roads in Russian Category:Roads in Ukraine
title: Highway M13 (Ukraine)
